description: Save, recall, and manage key memories with tags, timestamps, content search, expiration, and linking.
author: Hridya

tools.name: save_memory
tools.description: Saves a value to a key. If the key exists, it updates the memory. You can add/replace tags and set/remove expiration.

arguments.name: key
arguments.description: The key to save/update the value under.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The value to save.

arguments.name: tags
arguments.description: Optional: A list of tags to associate with this memory. If provided, replaces existing tags. Pass an empty array to remove all tags.

arguments.name: expires_in_seconds
arguments.description: Optional: The number of seconds until this memory expires. Pass 0 or a negative number to remove expiration.

tools.name: recall_memory
tools.description: Recalls a memory by its key, with optional related memories suggestions.

arguments.name: key
arguments.description: The key of the memory to recall.

arguments.name: include_related
arguments.description: Include related memory suggestions (default: true).

arguments.name: max_related
arguments.description: Maximum number of related memories to suggest (default: 5).

tools.name: list_memories
tools.description: Lists all saved memory keys (excluding expired ones). Optionally, filter by a specific tag.

arguments.name: tag
arguments.description: Optional: Filter memories by this tag.

tools.name: delete_memory
tools.description: Deletes a memory by its key.

arguments.name: key
arguments.description: The key of the memory to delete.

tools.name: list_all_tags
tools.description: Lists all unique tags currently in use across all memories (excluding expired ones).

tools.name: search_memory_content
tools.description: Intelligent fuzzy search for memories. Searches content, keys, and tags with smart similarity matching.

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: Text to search for in memory content, keys, and tags.

tools.name: link_memories
tools.description: Creates a directed link from a source memory to a target memory with a specified relationship type.

arguments.name: source_key
arguments.description: The key of the memory from which the link originates.

arguments.name: target_key
arguments.description: The key of the memory to which the link points.

arguments.name: relationship_type
arguments.description: The type of relationship (e.g., 'related_to', 'depends_on', 'is_part_of').

tools.name: get_linked_memories
tools.description: Retrieves a list of memories linked from a given source memory, optionally filtered by relationship type.

arguments.name: source_key
arguments.description: The key of the memory to get links from.

arguments.name: relationship_type
arguments.description: Optional: Filter linked memories by this relationship type.

tools.name: find_related_memories
tools.description: Finds memories related to a given memory through content similarity, shared tags, and link relationships.

arguments.name: memory_key
arguments.description: The key of the memory to find related memories for.

arguments.name: include_content
arguments.description: Include content-based similarity (default: true).

arguments.name: include_tags
arguments.description: Include tag-based similarity (default: true).

arguments.name: include_links
arguments.description: Include link-based relationships (default: true).

arguments.name: max_results
arguments.description: Maximum number of related memories to return (default: 10).

arguments.name: min_similarity
arguments.description: Minimum similarity threshold (0.0-1.0, default: 0.3).

tools.name: find_memory_path
tools.description: Finds the shortest connection path between two memories through their relationships.

arguments.name: from_key
arguments.description: The starting memory key.

arguments.name: to_key
arguments.description: The target memory key.

tools.name: search_by_relationship
tools.description: Search for memories using relationship patterns. Use * as wildcards.

arguments.name: pattern
arguments.description: Relationship pattern (format: 'source relationship target'). Examples: '* depends_on project1', 'task1 related_to *'

tools.name: find_memories_within_degrees
tools.description: Find all memories connected within a specified number of relationship degrees from a starting memory.

arguments.name: start_key
arguments.description: The starting memory key.

arguments.name: max_degrees
arguments.description: Maximum degrees of separation to search (default: 2).

arguments.name: relationship_type
arguments.description: Optional: Filter by specific relationship type.
